title: League update loop : (
body: whenever i open league i get a message along the lines of "we have restored this installation to an older version we'll now attempt to update", the client closes, gets stuck updating at 27/30 MB, then closes. I have tried hextech tool and it doesn't work, I don't have any anti-virus programs/fire wall. any ideas?

replies.body:
If running as admin doesn't solve your issue try running through some of the solutions here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues 
Or here:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues
Try opening the client by right clicking and using the 'run as administrator' option. This bug was happening to me too but I finally got it to work after trying that. Hope this helps!
